text: Felix George Rohatyn ( ;Burstein, Patricia, "A Wall Street Money Man, Felix (the Fixer) Rohatyn, Tries to Save New York City," People (magazine), September 22, 1975. May 29, 1928 - December 14, 2019) was an American politician and investment banker. Rohatyn was born in Vienna, Austria. He spent most of his career with Lazard from the 1960s through the 1990s. He was the United States Ambassador to France from 1997 to 2000. Rohatyn died in Manhattan on December 14, 2019 at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Politicians from Vienna Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Felix Rohatyn
